gaffer.operation.impl.cache

Class FetchCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • gaffer.operation.AbstractOperation<Void,Map<String,Iterable<?>>>
      • gaffer.operation.impl.cache.FetchCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CacheOperation, Operation<Void,Map<String,Iterable<?>>>

    public class FetchCache
extends AbstractOperation<Void,Map<String,Iterable<?>>>
implements CacheOperation
    A FetchCache fetches the entire cache Map. The cache is maintained per single OperationChain only. It cannot be used across multiple separate operation requests. So, it must be updated and fetched inside a single operation chain.
    See Also:
    UpdateCache, FetchCachedResult
